sentences.en: After more silence, the auctioneer then announced that the whole auction was over.
sentences.cn: 又沉默了一会儿，拍卖师便宣布整个拍卖会结束。

sentences.en: As the auctioneer called out bids, in New York one of the oldest banks on Wall Street, Lehman Brothers, filed for bankruptcy, triggering the most severe financial crisis since the 1920s.
sentences.cn: 随着拍卖商叫价，纽约华尔街历史最悠久的银行之一雷曼兄弟申请破产，引发了自20世纪20年代以来最严重的金融危机。

sentences.en: As the auctioneer called out bids, in New York one of the oldest banks on Wall Street, Lehman Brothers, filed for bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 随着拍卖商的叫价声，纽约华尔街最古老的银行之一雷曼兄弟宣告破产。
